Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Race : Fatigue :: Fast : ?


A. Food
B. Laziness
C. Hunger
D. Race
Solution: As the result of Race is Fatigue similarly the result of Fast is Hunger.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Peace : Chaos :: Creation : ?


A. Build
B. Construction
C. Destruction
D. Manufacture
Solution: As opposite meaning of peace is chaos similarly opposite meaning of creation is destruction.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Tiger : Forest :: Otter : ?


A. Cage
B. Sky
C. Nest
D. Water
Solution: As Tiger is found in Forest similarly  Otter is found in the water.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Poles : Magnet :: ? : Battery


A. Cells
B. Power
C. Terminals
D. Energy
Solution: As magnet has poles similarly battery has terminals.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Cassock : Priest :: ? : Graduate


A. Cap
B. Tie
C. Coat
D. Gown
Solution: A Priest wears cassock while Graduate wears gown.
